text: Nagri'ma navenesiana amanahu tamavutamava hiho, Ne'zanku'ma atupa'ma hanaza vahera ne'zana nezamita, zamunte omane vahe'mo'zama nonku'ma nehakesageta, nontamifi zamavare nenteta, kukenagu'ma atupa'ma hu'nesnaza vahera kukena zamiho. Ana nehutma tamagri koramo'zama knafima mani'nesanageta, ozamatreta zamaza hiho.
